languages.text: "Я, конечно, не жрец, и духи не всегда говорят со мной ясно, но руны все же раскидал. Впереди тебя ждет великое испытание, эттфатер. Будь осторож{mf|ен|на}, а лучше всего — возьми меня с собой. Нет лучшего способа позаботиться о своей безопасности".

"I am not a priest, of course, and the spirits do not always speak clearly to me, but I did cast the runes. You have a great challenge ahead of you, Aett-Vater. Be very careful, or better yet, take me with you. There is no better way to guard your safety."
languages.original_text: "Я, конечно, не жрец, и духи не всегда говорят со мной ясно, но руны все же раскидал. Впереди тебя ждет великое испытание, эттфатер. Будь осторож{mf|ен|на}, а лучше всего — возьми меня с собой. Нет лучшего способа позаботиться о своей безопасности".

traits.locale_text: "I am not a priest, of course, and the spirits do not always speak clearly to me, but I did cast the runes. You have a great challenge ahead of you, Aett-Vater. Be very careful, or better yet, take me with you. There is no better way to take care of your safety."

"I am not a priest, of course, and the spirits do not always speak clearly to me, but I did cast the runes. You have a great challenge ahead of you, Aett-Vater. Be very careful, or better yet, take me with you. There is no better way to take care of your safety."

"I am not a priest, of course, and the spirits do not always speak clearly to me, but I did cast the runes. You have a great challenge ahead of you, Aett-Vater. Be very careful, or better yet, take me with you. There is no better way to guard your safety."

"I am not a priest, of course, and the spirits do not always speak clearly to me, but I did cast the runes. You have a great challenge ahead of you, Aett-Vater. Be very careful, or better yet, take me with you. There is no better way to guard your safety."

"I am not a priest, of course, and the spirits do not always speak clearly to me, but I did cast the runes. You have a great challenge ahead of you, Aett-Vater. Be very careful, or better yet, take me with you. There is no better way to guard your safety."

languages.text: “当然，我不是什么祭司。神灵对我说的话，我有时候也听不太明白，不过我确实通过符文进行了占卜。你正面临着巨大的挑战，狼领。你得当心，或者说，你可以带我一起去。如果你想保证安全，没有比这更可靠的办法了。”
languages.original_text: "I am not a priest, of course, and the spirits do not always speak clearly to me, but I did cast the runes. You have a great challenge ahead of you, Aett-Vater. Be very careful, or better yet, take me with you. There is no better way to guard your safety."

traits.locale_text: “当然，我不是什么祭司。神灵对我说的话，我有时候也听不太明白，不过我确实通过符文进行了占卜。你正面临着巨大的挑战，狼领。你得当心，或者说，你可以带我一起去。如果你想保证安全，没有比这更可靠的办法了。”

languages.text: «Por supuesto, no soy ningún sacerdote y los espíritus no siempre me hablan con claridad, pero he lanzado las runas. Tiene un gran desafío por delante, Aett-Vater. Tenga mucho cuidado, o, mejor, lléveme a su lado. Es la única forma de garantizar su seguridad».
languages.original_text: "I am not a priest, of course, and the spirits do not always speak clearly to me, but I did cast the runes. You have a great challenge ahead of you, Aett-Vater. Be very careful, or better yet, take me with you. There is no better way to guard your safety."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto, no soy ningún sacerdote y los espíritus no siempre me hablan con claridad, pero he lanzado las runas. Tiene un gran desafío por delante, Aett-Vater. Tenga mucho cuidado, o, mejor, lléveme a su lado. Es la única forma de garantizar su seguridad».

languages.text: 「もちろん俺は司祭ではないし、精霊が必ずしもはっきりと語りかけてくるとは限らない。でもルーンは唱えたぞ。アエット＝ヴァテル、あんたには大きな試練が待ち受けている。十分注意するんだ。もしくは、俺を連れていけばいい。身の安全を守るのに、これ以上の方法はないぞ」
languages.original_text: "I am not a priest, of course, and the spirits do not always speak clearly to me, but I did cast the runes. You have a great challenge ahead of you, Aett-Vater. Be very careful, or better yet, take me with you. There is no better way to guard your safety."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん俺は司祭ではないし、精霊が必ずしもはっきりと語りかけてくるとは限らない。でもルーンは唱えたぞ。アエット＝ヴァテル、あんたには大きな試練が待ち受けている。十分注意するんだ。もしくは、俺を連れていけばいい。身の安全を守るのに、これ以上の方法はないぞ」

languages.text: "Ich bin natürlich kein Priester, und die Geister sprechen nicht immer deutlich zu mir, doch ich habe die Runen gewirkt. Vor Euch liegt eine große Herausforderung, Aett-Vater. Seid äußerst vorsichtig, oder besser noch: Nehmt mich mit. Es gibt keinen besseren Weg, Eure Sicherheit zu gewährleisten."
languages.original_text: "I am not a priest, of course, and the spirits do not always speak clearly to me, but I did cast the runes. You have a great challenge ahead of you, Aett-Vater. Be very careful, or better yet, take me with you. There is no better way to guard your safety."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin natürlich kein Priester, und die Geister sprechen nicht immer deutlich zu mir, doch ich habe die Runen gewirkt. Vor Euch liegt eine große Herausforderung, Aett-Vater. Seid äußerst vorsichtig, oder besser noch: Nehmt mich mit. Es gibt keinen besseren Weg, Eure Sicherheit zu gewährleisten."

languages.text: « Je ne suis pas prêtre, bien sûr, et les esprits ne me parlent pas toujours clairement, mais j'ai lancé les runes et un défi sans précédent vous attend, aett-vater. Soyez {mf|prudent|prudente}, ou mieux encore, permettez-moi de vous accompagner. C'est le meilleur moyen d'assurer votre sécurité. »
languages.original_text: "I am not a priest, of course, and the spirits do not always speak clearly to me, but I did cast the runes. You have a great challenge ahead of you, Aett-Vater. Be very careful, or better yet, take me with you. There is no better way to guard your safety."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis pas prêtre, bien sûr, et les esprits ne me parlent pas toujours clairement, mais j'ai lancé les runes et un défi sans précédent vous attend, aett-vater. Soyez {mf|prudent|prudente}, ou mieux encore, permettez-moi de vous accompagner. C'est le meilleur moyen d'assurer votre sécurité. »
